visual.name: Inforiver Super Filter
visual.description: Displays multiple category values in a tree structure

parentNodeColor.description: Change the color of the parent node text

parentNodeFontSize.description: Change the font size of the parent node text

parentNodeStyleFilter.description: Change the font style of the parent node text

rootNodeColor.description: Change the color of the top node text

rootNodeFontSize.description: Change the font size of the top node text

rootNodeStyle.description: Change the font style of the top node text

childNodeFontStyle.description: Change the font style of the child node text

progressBarColor.description: Change the color of the progress bar

presetButtonColor.description: To set the button color for presets

presetButtonBorderColor.description: To set the button border color for presets

presetBackgroundColor.description: To set the Presets Background Color

presetSelectedBackgroundColor.description: To set the Presets Background Color

presetSelectedTextColor.description: To set the Presets Text Color

presetTextColor.description: To set the Presets Text Color
